• there is a greater chance 
that you will have a 
caesarean section, a 
ventouse (vacuum) birth, or 
forceps birth;
• You may not need a blood 
transfusion;
• you may not see the 
consultant at your clinical 
appointment and are 
more likely to be seen by 
a wide range of health 
professionals including 
doctors in training;
• your partner is unlikely to 
be able to stay overnight.
